thread.title: Facebook unit WhatsApp's co-founder Jan Koum to quit

title: Facebook unit WhatsApp's co-founder Jan Koum to quit
text:
April 30, 2018 / 9:22 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago WhatsApp co-founder Jan Koum to quit Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
(Reuters) - WhatsApp Co-Founder and Chief Executive Officer Jan Koum is planning to quit, according to his Facebook ( FB.O ) post. FILE PHOTO: The WhatsApp app logo is seen on a smartphone in this picture illustration taken September 15, 2017. REUTERS/Dado Ruvic/Illustration/File Photo
"It's been almost a decade since Brian and I started WhatsApp, and it's been an amazing journey with some of the best people," Koum said in his post. ( bit.ly/2FwTMQO )
“But it is time for me to move on.” Reporting by Anirban Paul in Bengaluru; Editing by Arun Koyyur
